title: Almost have 5 Arcade skins. Who will be the mid laner?
body:
I really, really would have liked Arcade Ahri (Multicoloured Pixel Tails!) but she's getting another skin soon. Who do you think the Arcade Mid lane will be?

So far we have:
Arcade Sona
Arcade Hecarim
Arcade Miss Fortune 
Arcade Riven (PBE)

[This](https://uploads.disquscdn.com/images/0b87f5d8b9de1818826e5052fde30b9a6e9c574b590332cbfec45b43c3146667.jpg) hints at there being one more so it is not Final Boss Veigar.

replies.body:
Final Boss Urgot!!!!!!!

Rito, let me give you my money!!!

Kiiiiiiinda looks like it could be Blitzcrank or Urgot actually. Bloody hope its Urgot.
Imagine urgot shooting multiple glorious colours of seeking missiles

There's a Blitzcrank Arcade one on PBE with the Riven one.

(Battle Boss Blitzcrank).

1 more marksman, top lane, jungler, and midlaner.


arcade viktor pls :)

I've been thinking about this a lot.

Arcade Lux would be awesome although she got the Star Guardian skin not too long ago and that is pretty similar to Arcade imo.

Arcade Fizz would be dope as hell.

Arcade Katarina wouldn't be that great but it could work.

Arcade Brand would be alright. 

Arcade Annie wouldn't look good imo but that could be a possible one as well.

Arcade Viktor might be a good one.

Arcade Talon could be a possible option.

Arcade Galio would be a nice one.

Arcade Ekko? Although he is getting the Academy soon.

Arcade Anivia.

Arcade Ziggs

Arcade Xerath

Arcade Oriana

Arcade Syndra

Arcade Lissandra would look awesome. I love her.

Arcade Ahri would really fit her well although she is also getting an Academy skin soon too.
Okay. So, Arcade Fizz. And his ult would be pacman. He could throw a cherry at the enemy that summons Pacman. Omg, plz rito ;~; I will main fizz if you do this.

Heimerdinger ? 

Arcade Donger

and your right, Veigar isn't the midlaner. 

http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-8axKFcbQD0I/VckZj-C1U0I/AAAAAAAAvj4/PmNFfrb3qXo/s1600/Riven_Splash_6.jpg
Arcade Katarina and she does DDR moves during her ultimate at the speed she spins rite now.

Might have to draw Arcade Ahri...

Arcade Brand would look cool.
Arcade yasuo might be nice ... but then again, Zilean really needs a skin ...
ZIl got bloodmoon like 3 months ago

Arcade {{champion:99}}  ?

I'd think arcade {{champion:10}}  might be cool, you know how in mario how when he turns invincible that cool music plays and he becomes gold xD
i was reading some discussion on this and people said that urgot may be the adc for the enemy team and zed or azir may be the arcade mid laner but so far it is uncertain
